### Issue URL (Anti Adblock Script) [https://chzzk.naver.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fchzzk.naver.com%2F) ### Comment > Adguard is enabled, adblock is detected and the video quality is forcibly lowered to 360p. > The following rules work in uBlock Origin well but it seems do not work properly in AdGuard: > > chzzk.naver.com#%#//scriptlet('prevent-xhr', 'veta.naver.com/gfp') > chzzk.naver.com#%#//scriptlet('prevent-xhr', 'veta.naver.com/call') > chzzk.naver.com#%#//scriptlet('prevent-xhr', 'veta.naver.com/vas') Username: `@cheeze` ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/ck5ctl203w8wwkgoso8wgwgsogg8wgc3h9muz4k73m.png?nc=1)
